Package homework1

Class Account

java.lang.Object
homework1.Account
public class Account extends Object
The Account class represents a user account in a social media application. It stores information such as the user's username, birthdate, location, posts, followers, and following. The class also provides methods to interact with the user account such as logging in, logging out, adding posts, following and unfollowing other accounts, and blocking and unblocking accounts.

      public void addLike​(int interactionId, Account account_, int postId)
      This method allows an account to add a like to a post of another account.
      Parameters:
      interactionId - the interaction ID. interactionId is given manually because static is forbidden
      account_ - the account whose post will be liked
      postId - the ID of the post to be liked

      account_ - the account whose post will be commented on
